title: Spectacular Slovakia #2: Running and sightseeing in Bratislava
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
In the second episode of the Spectacular Slovakia podcast, the latest addition to our range of travel-related products, Slovak Spectator copy editor Anna Fay shares her tips with active travellers.  Where are the best places to run in Bratislava? What is the best way to sightsee and run at the same time? Anna answers these questions and more in our interview.
Spectacular Slovakia travel podcast is the latest addition to our range of travel-related products.
shop.spectator.sme.sk/spectacular_sl…a_travel_guide
